text:
@jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Not a word of condolence for the families of over 120,000 who lost their lives due to trump's incompetence in accepting the seriousness of COVID-19 
Not a word of compassion for the millions who contracted COVID-19 & still recovering.
Just bombast & endless blabbering 
me me me
